pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, November 7, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, November 7, 2016:

Vancouver, British Columbia

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a tour of the Vancouver Harbour aboard the Canadian Coast Guard Ship Sir Wilfrid Laurier.

Canada Place, Vancouver Harbour
999 Canada Place
Vancouver, British Columbia

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


12:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Minister of Transport, Marc Garneau, and will hold a press conference.

HMCS Discovery
1200 Stanley Park Drive,
Vancouver, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:20 p.m.


Note: all times local


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
